message:
I am interested in Multi-Threading and Concurrency these days so i thought that i can help by sharing 

https://codewala.net/2015/07/29/concurrency-vs-multi-threading-vs-asynchronous-programming-explained/

http://blog.slaks.net/2014-12-23/parallelism-async-threading-explained/

Multi-Threading
http://tutorials.jenkov.com/java-concurrency
(C# in nutshell) http://www.albahari.com/threading

Concurrency Models
http://java-is-the-new-c.blogspot.com.eg/2014/01/comparision-of-different-concurrency.html

http://www.slideshare.net/mariofusco/comparing-different-concurrency-models-on-the-jvm

Books
Java Concurrency in Practice
Concurrency in C# Cookbook
Seven Concurrency Models in Seven Weeks by Paul Butcher

and if anyone can add helpful resources for that topic(in general or in specific like: Android or iOS). please do
story: Ahmed Hashem shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Concurrency vs Multi-threading vs Asynchronous Programming : Explained
caption: codewala.net
description: Recently, I was speaking in an event and I asked a question to the audience in between my talk about Asynchronous programming , I found that some of the people were confused between multi-threadingâ€¦
